name: Mafia World: Bloody War
description:
You might be the son of the famous Ferraro Godfather, but you've never enjoyed the feeling of having a target on your back. That's why you moved overseas: to live freely with your first love, enjoying the high life without having to look over your shoulder every second. No need to worry over family "business"—pure pleasure was your calling card. Until... That phone call from your family's butler shattered your carefree bliss. No one knew what had happened to the old Godfather—not even whether he was dead or alive. Now you face a dilemma: keep enjoying your current lifestyle abroad, or return home to become the next Godfather...

1.Open plot—Choose your fate!
Follow your intuition and choose your own path. Explore multiple endings. Life or death hangs on your every decision!

2.Mafia business—You're in charge!
Nothing is forbidden in Sin City. Manage casinos, nightclubs, and loan sharks to gather resources to upgrade your industry, recruit more Capos, and expand your turf.

3.All kinds of beautiful women—Take your pick!
Set aside the gang grudges for a while and make some time for your soulmate. So many beauties to choose from! The charming agents, the sweet first girlfriend, the talented musician chick... There's always a girl who'll understand you.

4.Luxury cars—Boost your power!
Collect car parts to unlock exclusive luxury cars! Custom parts make every car stand out and help boost your power—all to conquer Sin City!

5.Tons of henchmen—Lead them your way!
Recruit Capos and fight for turf. Train your henchmen to form a powerful gang of Enforcers, Roadhogs, and Gunmen. Lead them to eliminate rival gangs and rule Sin City!

6.Team up—Power in numbers!
Your Alliance is the shield at your back. Craft strategies and tactics to suit the needs of your Alliance, and lead your allies to spread your influence across the region!

7.Conquer the world—With all its dangers!
Conquer battle-zones over 2 million square kilometers of seamless world map as you rise above the world's mafia kings.

8.Players worldwide—Develop together!
Work with bosses from around the world and deploy henchmen to deliver vengeance on gangs that have offended you. There will always be someone to accompany you on your way to the top of the mafia world!
